concept.title: Datum Reference Frames
concept.shortdesc: A datumreference consists of values and modifying symbols. A datumis a theoretically exact geometric reference that measures and verifies a theoretically exact point, axis, or plane. The system provides up to three datum reference letters and relative symbols followed by the tolerance value. Two or three mutually perpendicular planes performbest when you applying these datumreferences. They are jointly called datumreference frame.
